name: 4X4 Offroad Jeep desert Safari - Driving 3D Sim
name_original: 4X4 Offroad Jeep desert Safari - Driving 3D Sim
description:
Get ready for a real adventure of 4X4 Off road Jeep desert Racing game. In this adventure game you have to show your driving skills in jeep with high speed in desert safari. 4x4 off-roads jeeps with a racing simulation is an off road driving experience. A free 4x4 jeep racing game has a variety of missions and various opponents to compete for you. In this game you have loads of other crazy racers win a battle of racing in classic mode and unlock a real challenge of checkpoints. Yes, next mission gives you a task to collect all checkpoints in a way of racer with high speed and complete all other 4x4 racing cars.
Let's play a racing game like real battle field and laid down other racer with your highly skilled drive. Loads of racers and limited time gives you a real feel of challenge. So face all the challenges and show your killing driving skills and win the race with maximum speed and laid down other traffic racers.

You have multiple arenas to drive. While a desert racing gives you a real feel of adventurous drive. Get a real fun of off-road drive in amazing arena of desert with tons of 4x4 other jeep racers. There are off road monster jeeps in the desert so be careful with them. In the game there will other vehicles Heavy army truck, cars and off road heavy truck on the track also aware of them. Do not crash with them.
The entire environment in this game will be desert. No mountains or hilly environment. So there will be no chase or fear of fall down from the mountains or from the hills. This is complete off road jeep racing game for you. Win the first levels to unlock other jeeps and cars.

Features:
Legendary Off-Road racer.
Iconic rally 4x4 Jeep.
Realistic world location.
Drift your jeep in desert.
Best rally and driving experience.
Optimized Quality Graphics.
